hudson.tasks.Shell.command: OMERO_DIST=$WORKSPACE/OMERO.web if [ -e $OMERO_DIST ]; then if [ -e $WORKSPACE/omero-virtualenv ]; then source $WORKSPACE/omero-virtualenv/bin/activate $OMERO_DIST/bin/omero web stop sleep 5 $OMERO_DIST/bin/omero web status || true deactivate fi rm -rf $OMERO_DIST else $OMERO_DIST/bin/omero web stop || echo Not running virtualenv $WORKSPACE/omero-virtualenv --system-site-packages fi

OMERO_DIST=$WORKSPACE/OMERO.web OMERO_INSTALL=/tmp/omero-install/linux
ZIP=$(ls OMERO.py*.zip) DIST=${ZIP%.zip} unzip $ZIP rm -f $ZIP mv $WORKSPACE/$DIST $OMERO_DIST
source $WORKSPACE/omero-virtualenv/bin/activate
source $OMERO_INSTALL/settings.env
pip install --upgrade --no-deps --force-reinstall -r $OMERO_DIST/share/web/requirements-py27-nginx.txt pip install zeroc-ice pip install django-redis-cache>=1.6.5
#start-config $OMERO_DIST/bin/omero config set omero.web.application_server 'wsgi-tcp' $OMERO_DIST/bin/omero config set omero.web.application_server.max_requests 0
$OMERO_DIST/bin/omero config set omero.web.prefix '/web' $OMERO_DIST/bin/omero config set omero.web.static_url '/web/static/' $OMERO_DIST/bin/omero config set omero.web.static_root $WORKSPACE'/static'
$OMERO_DIST/bin/omero config set omero.web.session_engine 'django.contrib.sessions.backends.cache' $OMERO_DIST/bin/omero config set omero.web.caches '{"default": {"BACKEND": "redis_cache.RedisCache","LOCATION": "redis:6379"}}'
$OMERO_DIST/bin/omero config set omero.web.server_list '[["omero", 4064, "omero"], ["testintegration", 14064, "testintegration"]]'
$OMERO_DIST/bin/omero config set omero.web.application_server.host web $OMERO_DIST/bin/omero config set omero.web.application_server.port 4080
$OMERO_DIST/bin/omero web config nginx --http "$OMERO_WEB_PORT" --servername "web.nginx" >$OMERO_DIST/nginx.conf.tmp
sudo -u root cp $OMERO_DIST/nginx.conf.tmp $HOME/nginx/$NODE_NAME.conf
$OMERO_DIST/bin/omero config set omero.web.application_server.host 0.0.0.0
$OMERO_DIST/bin/omero web start
deactivate
